verbs.description: After [ARG0: Fox News ' Sean Hannity] [V: took] [ARG1: late - night host Jimmy Kimmel] [ARGM-GOL: to task] [ARGM-CAU: for mocking Melania Trump 's accent] , Kimmel shared a statement on Twitter .
